headline: compliance department
pros: The working environment is excellent. If you come in on time and work hard you can advance. The bosses are understanding and will work with you
cons: Place of business is all the way in New York City. OK if you live in the city. Helps a lot if you speak Mandarin. Most of the employees do so.

headline: Decent culture but terrible pay and no long term future.
pros: It's a decent learning experience and the hours are not crazy. The people are also very easy to work with.
cons: Definitely a lack of revenue which explains the absolutely terrible pay. Limited scope with respect to the ability to gain exposure to real investment banking activities.
